content: Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 May 2018I'm a Singaporean and have an industrial property to sell in Malaysia. It's a double storey terrace factory in Johor Bahru (Type B with 3500 sq ft). What are the steps and procedure to follow and who to look for?1 answerAnswerBump0

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 16 Sep 2018Not much info available but selling and buying is related because you also need to sell to a buyer.  Just that your end will capital gain tax. ​This wil give a basic idea: https://www.asiapropertyhq.com/buying-commercial-property-malaysia/​Best to just go to any properties house that sells industrial properties in Jb and go in as a interested customer and ask them about the buying and then selling process to gather more info.​Huat ah! :) 0 comments0
